mapper.sql: SALE_ORDER_NO, ID, OWNER, BUY_ORDER_NO, INSURANCE_NO, PROPOSAL_NO, ORDER_NO, ORDER_TYPE, POLICY_URL, POLICY_NO, TRANSACTION_ID, PRODUCT_KEY, DESTINATION, EFFECT_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, ISSUE_DATE, HOLDER_TYPE, HOLDER_NAME, HOLDER_CERTI_TYPE, HOLDER_CERTI_NO, HOLDER_SEX, HOLDER_BIRTHDAY, HOLDER_EMAIL, HOLDER_PHONE, CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO, SALE_PRICE, BUY_PRICE, TOTAL_PREMIUM, TRAVEL_DAY, INSURED_COUNT, REMARK, IS_TEAM, SOURCE_NAME, EXTENDED_FIELDS_JSON, PNR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR, MODIFIER, VALID,INTERNAT_ORCIVIL,SUM_COPIES
mapper.select:
select oe.SALE_ORDER_NO, oe.ID, oe.OWNER, oe.BUY_ORDER_NO, oe.INSURANCE_NO, oe.PROPOSAL_NO, oe.ORDER_NO, oe.ORDER_TYPE, oe.POLICY_URL, oe.POLICY_NO, oe.TRANSACTION_ID, oe.PRODUCT_KEY, oe.DESTINATION, oe.EFFECT_DATE, oe.EXPIRE_DATE, oe.ISSUE_DATE, oe.HOLDER_TYPE, oe.HOLDER_NAME, oe.HOLDER_CERTI_TYPE, oe.HOLDER_CERTI_NO, oe.HOLDER_SEX, oe.HOLDER_BIRTHDAY, oe.HOLDER_EMAIL, oe.HOLDER_PHONE, oe.CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO, oe.SALE_PRICE, oe.BUY_PRICE, oe.TOTAL_PREMIUM, oe.TRAVEL_DAY, oe.INSURED_COUNT, oe.REMARK, oe.IS_TEAM, SOURCE_NAME, oe.EXTENDED_FIELDS_JSON, oe.PNR, oe.CREATE_TIME, oe.MODIFY_TIME, oe.CREATOR, oe.MODIFIER, oe.VALID FROM INS_SALE_ORDER_EXT oe, INS_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL od where oe.SALE_ORDER_NO = od.SALE_ORDER_NO
AND oe.TRANSACTION_ID = #{transactionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
